constants.comment: Approximate um/step at 3 K, 60 V. Sign is relative to scanner sign. 2018/02/22

sensor_status.name: sensor_status
sensor_status.vals: <Enum: {'Resistance Underrange', 'CS Overload', 'Temp Underrange', 'VMIX Overload', 'VDIF Overload', 'Temp Overrange', 'OK', 'VCM Overload', 'Resisance Overrange'}>
sensor_status.label: Sensor_Status

sensor_status.name: sensor_status
sensor_status.vals: <Enum: {'Resistance Underrange', 'CS Overload', 'Temp Underrange', 'VMIX Overload', 'VDIF Overload', 'Temp Overrange', 'OK', 'VCM Overload', 'Resisance Overrange'}>

sensor_status.name: sensor_status
sensor_status.vals: <Enum: {'Sensor Units Overrange', 'Temp Underrange', 'Temp Overrange', 'Invalid Reading', 'OK', 'Sensor Units Zero'}>
sensor_status.label: Sensor_Status

voltage_limits.comment: V_daq should never be outside of voltage_limits.

speed.comment: Rate of movement of the scanner (when not scanning).

cantilever.comment: CAP lockin X reading, freq = 6.821 kHz, amp = 1 V

analog_inputs.comment: Multichannel value is aggregate for all ai channels.

analog_outputs.comment: Max ao rates are per channel.
